products.title: Walnut Perfect Fit
products.description: Walnut woodline 9408 perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Kalm Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit kalm wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Khol Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit khol wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Pure Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any anthraciteupvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit polar wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Hive Lusso Steel Perfect Fit
products.description: Hivelussosteel perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive lusso steel grey perfect fit pleated blind px80205.

products.title: Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackouttaupe beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
